string-array.name: YSU_desc_array
string-array.item: Shinchon subway exit 2 or 3, walk straight after exit to get to Yonsei University main gate
Great place to buy household electronics, blankets, toiletries and groceries.Shinchon station exit 8
Bus 6001 goes directly to and from airport. Takes about 50 minutes and costs 10.000KRW.(NOTE: Have cash ready, does not take card)
Casa Villa Residence, cheap temporary housing
Small selection of English books in second floor.
U-Plex, red statue in front of Hyundai Department store is often used as a meeting point.
The yonsei campus bus stops here and goes to the language school
Buddhist temple, and mountain hiking area
You can buy bread and western baked goods here
